title: .Net Core Client version 0.0.3-beta
content: Dear Infinispanners and .NET Core lovers,  weâ€™re pleased to annouce the new release of the .NET Core client. Release 0.0.3-beta comes with a bunch of new features:   * remote event listener.   * cluster failover configuration.   * TLS with server cert verification.   * some new hotrod operations.  Good starting point could be the . Documentation is growing up, temporarily placed .  Please let us know your thoughts. A good place to share them is the page.  The Infinispan Team
